code: /** @format */import React from'react';import{ExpItems}from'../TextInfo';import'../App.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ExpBlock=function ExpBlock(i){i=i.i;var item=ExpItems[i];var background={backgroundImage:"url(../images/loc/".concat(item.img,")")};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"experience",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loc-img",style:background}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"exp_text",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"work_title",children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{target:"_blank",rel:"noreferrer",href:item.link,children:item.loc}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"work_period",children:item.period})]})]});};export default ExpBlock;
